word:
You move by impulse. You feel unreconciled to your brethren because you are not sent out to preach the truth. You are not fit for this trust. More than one efficient preacher would be required to follow in your wake to bind up the wounds and bruises which your harsh dealing would make. 
                                                                           222
God is not pleased with you, and I fear that you will fail of everlasting life.
